Ability.Name: -- Rotation Switcher --
Ability.Lua:
local playerLevel = UnitLevel("Player")
if playerLevel < 10 then PQR_SwapRotation("Starter (HonorBuddy Warrior DPS)") elseif playerLevel < 85 and playerLevel >= 10 then local talentTree = GetPrimaryTalentTree()
if talentTree == 1 then PQR_SwapRotation("Leveling Mode - Arms (HonorBuddy Warrior DPS)") elseif talentTree == 2 then PQR_SwapRotation("Leveling Mode - Fury (HonorBuddy Warrior DPS)") elseif talentTree == 3 then PQR_SwapRotation("Leveling Mode - Tank (HonorBuddy Warrior DPS)") end elseif playerLevel == 85 then local talentTree = GetPrimaryTalentTree()
if talentTree == 1 then PQR_SwapRotation("Raid Mode - Arms (HonorBuddy Warrior DPS)") elseif talentTree == 2 then PQR_SwapRotation("Raid Mode - Fury (HonorBuddy Warrior DPS)") elseif talentTree == 3 then PQR_SwapRotation("Raid Mode - Tank (HonorBuddy Warrior DPS)") end end

Ability.Name: -- Load LUA --
Ability.Lua: if PQR_RotationStarted == true then PQR_RotationStarted = false if PQR_LoadLua ~= nil then if PQR_LoadLua("PQR_Firepong.lua") == false then PQR_WriteToChat("Put the file PQR_Firepong.lua in the Data file for this profile to work properly!!!", "Error") PQR_RotationStop() return true end end end

Ability.Name: Strike
Charge
Victory Rush
Rend
Thunder Clap
Heroic Strike
Mortal Strike
Bloodthirst
-- IsFlying/Pull --
Execute
Overpower
Heroic Throw
Ability.Lua:
local hasTarget = UnitExists("Target") local isDead = UnitIsDead("Target") local Enemy = UnitCanAttack("Player","Target") local htKnown = IsSpellKnown(57755)
if hasTarget and not isDead and Enemy and htKnown then local inInstance = IsInInstance() local spec = GetPrimaryTalentTree() local inRange = IsSpellInRange(tostring(GetSpellInfo(57755))) local chargeCD,chargedur = GetSpellCooldown(100) local chargeTime = chargeCD + chargedur - GetTime() local inCombat = UnitAffectingCombat("Player") local threat = UnitThreatSituation("Player",UnitName(PQR_CustomTarget))
if spec == (1 or 2) then if not inInstance and chargeTime < 12 and chargeTime > 0 and inRange and not inCombat then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(57755)),PQR_CustomTarget) end elseif spec == 3 and threat == (0 or 1 or 2) then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(57755)),PQR_CustomTarget) end end

Ability.Name: Taunt
Battle Shout
Ability.Lua:
local bsBuff = UnitBuffID("Player",6673)
if not bsBuff and not IsMounted() then return true end

Ability.Name: Slam
-- Default Battle Stance --
Ability.Lua:
local inCombat = UnitAffectingCombat("Player") local index = GetShapeshiftForm() local hasTarget = UnitExists("Target")
if not hasTarget and not inCombat and index ~= 1 then CastShapeshiftForm(1) end

Ability.Name: -- Learn Talents --
Ability.Lua:
local hasPoints = GetUnspentTalentPoints() local spec = GetPrimaryTalentTree() local isKnown = IsSpellKnown(46924)
if spec == 1 then if isKnown and hasPoints > 0 then AddPreviewTalentPoints(2,2,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(2,2,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(2,2,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(2,3,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(2,3,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(2,4,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(2,4,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(3,1,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(3,1,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(3,1,1) LearnPreviewTalents() elseif hasPoints > 0 and not isKnown then AddPreviewTalentPoints(1,1,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(1,1,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(1,1,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(1,3,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(1,3,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(1,4,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(1,4,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(1,6,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(1,6,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(1,6,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(1,8,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(1,8,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(1,8,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(1,10,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(1,10,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(1,12,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(1,12,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(1,13,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(1,14,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(1,14,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(1,16,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(1,15,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(1,15,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(1,15,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(1,17,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(1,17,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(1,18,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(1,18,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(1,9,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(1,20,1) AddPreviewTalentPoints(1,2,1) LearnPreviewTalents() end elseif spec == 2 then return false elseif spec == 3 then return false end
